title: Experimental and simulation study of American saffron seed oil blended with diesel
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Valiveti Sivaramakrishna, Shaik Hussain, Chintalapudi Ravi Kiran, Jayashri N. Nair, Irfan Anjum Badruddin, Abdul Saddique Shaik, Sarfaraz Kamangar, Muhammad Mahmood Ali, Muhammad Nasir Bashir
